data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Battle Girl characters Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Battle Girl characters Pack 1" and "RPG Maker MV - Battle Girl characters Pack 1" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Look out men! These new girl battlers are here and they mean business! Add a fun yet dangerous female element to your game with these new Battle Girls. Featuring sprite sheets with Side View Actors, 8 Bust Ups, 2 Face Sheets with different hats / hoods, 8 Girl Enemies, 28 Battlebacks including school hallways, city grounds, sports stadiums, classrooms, lobbies, libraries, and more! Features: * 8 Side View Actors (2 sheets each) * 8 Bust ups * 16 Face sheets * 8 Enemies * 28 Battlebacks * Formatted for use in RPG Maker MV/MZ Terms of Use: * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice. * OK to be used in Commercial projects * Contents can be edited * OK for use in games with gore * OK for use in adult-rated games
data.about_the_game:
Look out men! These new girl battlers are here and they mean business! Add a fun yet dangerous female element to your game with these new Battle Girls. Featuring sprite sheets with Side View Actors, 8 Bust Ups, 2 Face Sheets with different hats / hoods, 8 Girl Enemies, 28 Battlebacks including school hallways, city grounds, sports stadiums, classrooms, lobbies, libraries, and more!

Features:

* 8 Side View Actors (2 sheets each)
* 8 Bust ups
* 16 Face sheets
* 8 Enemies
* 28 Battlebacks
* Formatted for use in RPG Maker MV/MZ

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
